org.plexian.pendulum

Class LivingEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.pendulum.Entity
      • org.plexian.pendulum.LivingEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Anti, Player

    public abstract class LivingEntity
extends Entity
    The class for a living entity, that is an entity with life.
    Author:
    walt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double life
      The current life the entity has.
      protected double maxLife
      The maximum amount of life that the entity can have.

      • Fields inherited from class org.plexian.pendulum.Entity

        aabb, id, inventory, location, oldLocation, program, size, velocity

      Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with sizeX, sizeY, maxLife, and life.
      LivingEntity(Shader shader, double life, double maxLife, Location location, Vector2d size)
      Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with size, maxLife, and life.

      Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with size.

      • LivingEntity

        public LivingEntity(Shader shader,
                    double life,
                    double maxLife,
                    Location location,
                    Vector2d size)
        Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with size, maxLife, and life.
        Parameters:
        life - The current life of the entity.
        maxLife - The maximum life the entity can have.
        location - The location of the entity.
        size - The size of the entity as an ordered pair.

      • LivingEntity

        public LivingEntity(Inventory inventory,
                    Shader shader,
                    World w,
                    double x,
                    double y,
                    double sizeX,
                    double sizeY,
                    double life,
                    double maxLife)
        Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with sizeX, sizeY, maxLife, and life.
        Parameters:
        w - The world the entity is at.
        x - The X-coordinate the entity is at.
        y - The Y-coordinate the entity is at.
        sizeX - The size of the entity X-axis respective.
        sizeY - The size of the entity Y-axis respective.
        life - The current life of the entity.
        maxLife - The maximum life the entity can have.
